Title: Final Fantasy: The Spirits Within
Genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Fantasy, Romance, Sci-Fi
Writer: Hironobu Sakaguchi (story), Al Reinert, Jeff Vintar, Jack Fletcher (additional dialogue), Bruce B.L. Jurgens (Story Editor), Ramin Mebdy (Farsi adaptation)
Actors: Ming-Na Wen, Alec Baldwin, Ving Rhames, Steve Buscemi
Plot: A scientist makes a last stand on Earth with the help of a ragtag team of soldiers against an invasion of alien phantoms.
